oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: NBC News - 1940-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC News featuring war reports from H. V. Kaltenborn and Max Jordan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces H. V. Kaltenborn -- News report (H. V. Kaltenborn) -- Announcer talks -- News report from London -- News report from Paris -- Announcer talks -- News report from Brussels (Louis [?]) -- Announcer talks -- News report from Berlin (Max Jordan) -- Announcer closing statement
